vendors.Name: Haywaiian Horse Productions
vendors.Desc: I Mele. I'm fueled by ponies, bacon and shiny bits! I sell a wide variety of MLP merch from stickers, buttons and prints, to charms, fluffy pillows, pins and much more!

vendors.Name: Onix Angel Creations
vendors.Desc: Hello I'm Onix! I'm a artist, content creator, and fursuit maker. I offer original works in my online store including pride clothing, lanyards, keychains, and more!

vendors.Name: PlushTrapShop
vendors.Desc: I’m a UK based seller who specialises in keychains, charms, stickers and prints. While I mostly sell MLP related works, I’m recently beginning to branch out into other fandoms such as Bluey, Centaurworld, Pokémon and Sanrio with new products released monthly (often faster).

vendors.Name: SpK’s Stash
vendors.Desc: I have stickers (through Redbubble). I can draw, print and frame art commissions (size varying). It’s mostly art commissions, but I do have a variety of other objects available through Redbubble (until I have to tools to manufacture them myself).
